# Shuup Scatl

This addons adds dynamic product filters (based on angular 5) to shuup.

## Screenshots

![]()

## Online Demo

[]()

## Installation

Install using `pip`
```
pip install shuup-scatl
```

Add [`attrim`][1] (a dependency) and `scatl` to your `INSTALLED_APPS` setting:
```
INSTALLED_APPS = (
    # [...]
    'attrim',
    'scatl',
)
```


[1]: https://gitlab.com/nilit/shuup-attrim
